DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the difference between self-reported, estimated blood glucose level versus blood glucose levels measured with a Blood Glucose Meter.
DOC.criteria: 1. Males and females, 18 years of age and above 2. Type 2 diabetes 3. Able to speak, read, and understand English 4. Willing to complete all study procedures 1. Type 1 diabetes 2. Currently a user of continuous glucose monitoring system 3. Currently pregnant 4. Hemophilia or any other bleeding disorder 5. Employee of competitive medical device company 6. Cognitive disorder or other condition which, in the opinion of the investigator (or designee), would put the person at risk or seriously compromise the integrity of the study
